events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and still haven't received any shipping updates or tracking information. The delivery is way overdue.
The customer's message contains keywords related to shipping delay and tracking issues, categorizing under Delivery Delay.
Assigning the case to the logistics support team to investigate the shipment delay and provide an update.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order is delayed and I'm here to help find out what's happening with your shipment.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can track your package and check the current status?
Thanks for the reply. My order number is 7894561230 and it was supposed to be shipped to 123 Elm Street, Springfield.
I've checked with the carrier and it seems there was an unexpected delay at the sorting facility. Your package is now prioritized and should arrive within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update and the effort to speed up delivery. Looking forward to receiving my order soon. Thanks for the help!
Glad we could clarify the delay and arrange faster shipping. Please reach out again if any other issues arise with your order.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived and everything is in good condition. Let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case now as the delivery issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
